name: Cattaca
description:
Game description

Help the two astronaut cats survive their way back home avoiding or destroying waves of asteroids and space junk. In this physics-based bullet hell your shots control your movement so watch out were you aim!

We think that the best way to play the game is with two gamepads and a friend so each one can control a cat, but you can try the game on your own with the keyboard if you want.

-------------------------------

Controls

Gamepad Controls

Left Joystick
TurnRTShootLTPulse

*You have to use the mouse to navigate the menus

Keyboard Controls

ActionsCat1Cat2
Turn Left
AJTurn Right
DLShootWIPulseLeft Shift
Right Shift

*We recommend playing this game with two gamepads

-------------------------------
Assets ussed for the game:

  • Sound effects from Soundly and Retro 8Bit Sounds https://www.unrealengine.com/marketplace/en-US/slug/retro-8bit-sounds
  • Music from: Mega Game Music Collection https://www.unrealengine.com/marketplace/en-US/slug/mega-game-music-collection 
  • Ui from: SDF Robo Progress Bars https://www.unrealengine.com/marketplace/en-US/slug/sdf-robo-progress-bars 
  • Particles made thanks to: Luos's Particle Toolkit Vol. 1 https://www.unrealengine.com/marketplace/en-US/slug/luos-s-a-particle-a-day-volume
  • Asteroid textures from Texturecan
    • https://www.texturecan.com/details/136/
  • Earth Textures from Planetpixelmporium
    • http://planetpixelemporium.com/earth8081.html
  • Satelite wings from Free3d
    • https://free3d.com/3d-model/satellite-v1--384167.html
  • Nebula background from Spacescape
    • http://alexcpeterson.com/spacescape/
